healthiest.title: Roasted Salmon
healthiest.summary: High in omega-3 fatty acids with anti-inflammatory benefits. Supports protein needs for muscle recovery.

health_prediction.short_term: Mental clarity and sustained energy without bloating.
health_prediction.long_term: Improved muscle recovery and reduced inflammation.

balanced.title: Chicken Paillard
balanced.summary: Lean protein with a good balance of nutrients. Light preparation supports digestive comfort.

health_prediction.short_term: Steady energy levels with good satiety.
health_prediction.long_term: Consistent protein intake supports muscle maintenance.

indulgent.title: House Burger
indulgent.summary: High protein option that satisfies cravings. Ask for sauce on the side to control sodium.

health_prediction.short_term: May cause some fullness but provides good post-workout recovery proteins.
health_prediction.long_term: Occasional indulgence is fine when balanced with healthier choices.
